% ============================================================
% Color Definitions
% ============================================================

\definecolor{codebackground}{RGB}{248,248,248}
\definecolor{codekeyword}{RGB}{0,0,180}
\definecolor{codecomment}{RGB}{0,128,0}
\definecolor{codestring}{RGB}{163,21,21}
\definecolor{codenumber}{RGB}{128,128,128}
\definecolor{linkcolor}{RGB}{0,51,153}

% ============================================================
% Code Listing Style
% ============================================================

\lstset{
    backgroundcolor=\color{codebackground},
    basicstyle=\ttfamily\small,
    breaklines=true,
    breakatwhitespace=true,
    captionpos=b,
    commentstyle=\color{codecomment},
    extendedchars=true,
    frame=single,
    framesep=3pt,
    keepspaces=true,
    keywordstyle=\color{codekeyword}\bfseries,
    numbers=left,
    numbersep=10pt,
    numberstyle=\tiny\color{codenumber},
    rulecolor=\color{black},
    showspaces=false,
    showstringspaces=false,
    showtabs=false,
    stepnumber=1,
    stringstyle=\color{codestring},
    tabsize=4,
    xleftmargin=20pt
}

% Language-specific styles
\lstdefinestyle{python}{
    language=Python,
    morekeywords={self,yield,async,await,True,False,None}
}

\lstdefinestyle{javascript}{
    language=JavaScript,
    morekeywords={const,let,async,await,class,export,import,from,default,of}
}

\lstdefinestyle{bash}{
    language=bash,
    morekeywords={sudo,apt,npm,pip,docker}
}

\lstdefinestyle{yaml}{
    morekeywords={true,false,null}
}

% ============================================================
% Hyperref Configuration
% ============================================================

\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,
    linkcolor=linkcolor,
    urlcolor=linkcolor,
    citecolor=linkcolor,
    pdftitle={{Book Title}},
    pdfauthor={{Author Name}},
    pdfsubject={{Subject}},
    pdfkeywords={{keyword1, keyword2}}
}

}
